titleStmt.title: Cover letter and transaction statement ending June 30, 1904, Lincoln Land Company

notesStmt.note:
Document includes cover letter and transaction statement. View image of six-month financial statement ending June 24, 1904, for full display. Handwritten by Bronson Rumsey, page 4: "June 30. 1904
$2.000.00
452.95"

bibl.title: Cover letter and transaction statement ending June 30, 1904, Lincoln Land Company

msIdentifier.repository: McCracken Research Library, MS407 Bronson Rumsey Collection

div1.note:
Office of Lincoln Land Company
Rooms 33-36, 1241 O Street
Lincoln, Neb.
C. H. Morrill, President.
A. B. Minor, Sec'y and Treasurer.
Quotations of Prices Are Subject to Change without Notice.
div1.p: We hand you herewith statement showing transactions with respect to Cody property for the six months ending June 24, 1904, showing a net balance of $2452.95 due you as Trustee. Of this amount we have already remitted you $2,000 and now hand you herewith New York exchange, your order, for $452.95, the balance. Please receipt and return the accompanying voucher.
Statement of business transacted at Cody, Wyoming, by the Lincoln Land Company. with respect to the one-hald interest of Bronson Rumsey, Trustee, for the six months ending June 30, 1904.
